headline.main: BRITISH NOW LOOK TO STALIN MEETING; London Views Cairo Parley as Excellent Prelude to Talk With Russian Leader

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Dec. 1 -- The Roosevelt-Churchill-Chiang conferences were regarded in London tonight as an excellent prelude to the Stalin-Roosevelt-Churchill meeting that Prime Minister Churchill said he hoped would take place before the first of next year.
